Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 38th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1990...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 6/16/1990 (Going to NYM: LF M. Young, C J. Owens. Going to CHC: RF C. Smith)...

Signed as a free agent by Houston on 10/1/1990 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/5/1994, off Dan Plesac (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/1994, off John Burkett (PHI)...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
